items.text: low full toss wide outside off, tapped to sweeper's right. Couldn't get his hands through this fast enough
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Asghar Afghan, 1 run

items.text: bouncer dug in too short. Climbs over the batsman's head as he ducks underneath
items.postText: Some breathing room for Afghanistan. An extra ball to try and find a boundary
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 wide

items.text: length on off stump, tapped to extra cover on the up
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hashmatullah Shahidi, no run

items.text: offcutter at a length outside off, chopped to third man
items.postText: Shamshear: "@Winn, I remember queueing few hours in scorching sun outside the stadium at Dhaka for ticket and later watching Michael Bevan scoring 185* against Asia XI in 2000. What a great cricketer he was..Golden cricket days. "
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 run

items.text: another bouncer dug in too short and Rahim has to leap one-handed to parry this up for himself
items.postText: another ball to find a boundary...
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Asghar Afghan, 1 wide

items.text: offcutter at a length outside off. He can only push this down the pitch. Good bowling from Mustafiz
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Asghar Afghan, no run

items.text: short of a length on middle stump, punches to long-on off the back foot
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 run

items.text: mix up but he's safe! The fielder from midwicket can't pick this up cleanly. Shahidi would've been in a lot of trouble. Still is from the effort after jarring his knee in with a dive, but at least he's not out. He hesitated as Afghan dropped the ball into the leg side and was really scrambling at the end
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Asghar Afghan, 1 run

items.text: down leg side. Bangladesh a bit sloppy over the last ten minutes. This one is full and down leg side, he can't connect on the sweep
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 wide

items.text: full on middle stump, flicked to long-on
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 run

items.text: length on middle stump, gets under this and mistimes the sweep. No one at deep midwicket, but he can't get enough pace on this to beat long-on to his right
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Asghar Afghan, 2 runs

items.text: length on off stump, defended on the front foot
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Asghar Afghan, no run

items.text: another possible missed opportunity for run-out. Full and fired outside off. He flicks straight to square leg where Mehidy fumbles as Shahidi has another nervous moment
items.postText: Praneeth: "Two settled and in-form batsmen with big hitters to come. Time to change gears now!"
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Asghar Afghan, 1 run

items.preText: Mashrafe back. The one bowler they've really gone after tonight. Does he sense wickets because of that?
items.text: length on middle stump, opens up his stance but has no room. Taps it towards long-on and hobbles the single
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Asghar Afghan, 1 run

items.text: length ball in at middle stump, tapped to long-on with the angle
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 run

items.text: whipped past short fine and he didn't even need to make great connection on this. Poor ball. Length and angled down leg, it's off the inside half and racing away
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Asghar Afghan, FOUR runs

items.text: taken at third man! There it is, the wicket opportunity. Mortaza has his counterpart. Length ball on off, there for the slog, but extra bounce does him. Gets a top edge. Mahmudullah runs back from short third man, sways around and adjusts to take a good catch in the end
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Asghar Afghan, OUT

dismissal.text: Asghar Afghan c Mahmudullah b Mashrafe Mortaza 39 (47b 2x4 0x6) SR: 82.97

items.text: gets away with a short ball heading down leg. Shahidi a bit too eager to put this away. Short fine was in but he can't get it past him
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 run

items.text: short of a length on leg stump, clipped off the hip to deep square
items.postText: Eight of the over. Ten more such overs and they'll get a tie. 81 off 60. There are sixes in this batting line-up still. But how quickly can they get them in?
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mohammad Nabi, 1 run

items.text: length on off stump, tapped to the bowler off the back foot
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Mohammad Nabi, no run

items.text: length on off, steps out and drives straight to extra cover
items.postText: Tootu Kurra: "@praneeth, they should have changed gears 5 overs back. I think its too late now for afg, hope they move hitters up the order unlike the other day."
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Mohammad Nabi, no run

items.text: length on middle stump, coming in with the natural angle. Taps it down to long-on
items.postText: 1 off 3 this over. Shahidi will be looking for the boundary...
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Mohammad Nabi, 1 run

items.text: and he'll find it! Poor bowling. Short and fast down leg side, he merely has to swivel and get bat to drag this wide of short fine
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Hashmatullah Shahidi, FOUR runs

items.text: full on leg stump, driven to long-on
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 run

items.text: yorker length outside off, jammed into the open midwicket area
items.postText: Not a bad over for Bangladesh. They'll take seven.
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Mohammad Nabi, 1 run
